name: Stickman (itch) (VIOLET)
description:
After being assigned a project for your college art class, you canceled plans to hang out with your friends and instead spent the day at the local art museum in order to find some inspiration for the report. 

Unfortunately, you haven't found a drop of inspiration, and it seems like the day has been wasted. You'll have to come back another time and inevitably waste another day on an assignment that you don't really care about.

However, on your way out of the museum, you run into someone - or something - that just might help change your perspective on what is art, inspiration, and beauty.

A stick man.

This (very) short visual novel was uploaded on April Fool's Day and has about 30 minutes of gameplay.

Stickman is free to play and contains two original music tracks (available to download for $1).

This game is appropriate for all ages.
